title: Connect to Devices w/ coBridge
description: coBridge is an open-source edge software provided by coScene, currently supporting ros1 noetic, ros2 foxy and humble versions. coBridge runs as a ros node on the robot side and interacts with the cloud through websocket connections. After establishing a connection with the cloud, coBridge can subscribe to ros topics and call ros services based on cloud commands, enabling real-time robot status monitoring, remote command deployment, and other functionalities.
